divs: Sighting DetailsI had happen to just look out the window saw the moon and what i thought was a star below it.The object was in one postion for few minutes it was most likely moving slowly.I got binoculars out to look at it and saw a bright yeelow-orange light... it might have been around 5 little lights together, i also saw a red ball next to it that was dim. My vison is a little bad so some things could have been decieving but i thought i saw it change from that ball to a circle with the yellow orange lights around it. when it got farther away like 5 minutes later i checked it out again with the binoculars and saw it change back and forth about every 10 seconds from the yellow-orange to a tealblue-aqua-greenish color it was moving slow and and i started to loose it under a tree line the object was bright without using the binoculars but using them it wasn't it was too small and or wouldn't show up on a camera i have 2 others with me that saw it though one doesn't think it was one and the other did'nt know what it was. If it was an aircraft I am sorry but i've never seen one go so slow.
trends: There have been 32 other sightings in La Porte
There were no other sightings in La Porte on or around January 30th 2009
